content: Amazing article Michael. Thank you so much for allowing me to expand my mind further… I have always been into reading various kinds of books and learning little bits and pieces of each subject. One thing I really like about your post is the part on connecting the different kinds of subjects together… Favorite quote: “ It is important to view knowledge as sort of a semantic tree — make sure you understand the fundamental principles, i.e. the trunk and big branches, before you get into the leaves/details or there is nothing for them to hang onto.” Cheers! Steve Daniels Blogger on Self-Confidence Mastery www.masteryourselfconfidence.com @steveatmysc
